PSCT.Base: If you control a WATER monster and your opponent has a monster on their field or GY: Take 1 "Icejade" monster from your Deck, and either send it to the GY or Special Summon it. If a face-up "Icejade" monster you control leaves the field by an opponent's card, except by being destroyed (and except during the Damage Step): You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 card your opponent controls; banish it. You can only use each effect of "Icejade Manifestation" once per turn.
